text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump 117,000 Americans have now died from the coronavirus. There is no cure. There is no vaccine. There still aren’t enough tests. Or tracing. Cases are spiking in some states. And the president of the United States has absolutely no plan to do anything about it.
